pages.text: $(li)Cave centipedes are hostile, slow but strong creatures.$(br)$(li)If they bite you, you will be afflicted by a powerfull $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)Poison$(/l) II effect for a few seconds.$(br)$(li)Cave Centipedes will not doubt to attack $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cockroach)Cockroaches$(/l) or players if they are near them.
$(li)Cave Centipedes may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/cave_centipede_leg)Cave Centipede Legs$(/l) upon death.
